channel.title: The Six Triple Eight on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in The Six Triple Eight on My New Hugo Site

item.title: The Six Triple Eight
item.description: Prolific filmmaker Tyler Perry’s latest is a departure from his usual fare. The actor-director tells the story of the inspiring women of the 6888th Central Postal Directory Battalion, the only all-Black unit of the Women’s Army Corps that served in Europe. It is a tale not many were aware of, and the movie highlights how the women endured and served with dedication despite the odds against them.
